titles.title: Honoring Dr. Carolyn R. Wilder, Professor of Child Development at West Los Angeles College in Los Angeles, California, in recognition of her retirement after 32 years of service to the College.
Honoring Dr. Carolyn R. Wilder, Professor of Child Development at West Los Angeles College in Los Angeles, California, in recognition of her retirement after 32 years of service to the College.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on 21st Century Competitiveness.

committee.name: House Education and the Workforce
committee.subcommittee: Higher Education and Workforce Development Subcomittee

bill.summary:
Honors Dr. Carolyn R. Wilder, upon her retirement from West Los Angeles College in Los Angeles, California, for 32 years of service to the College.
Recognizes her accomplishments in childcare service, higher education, and as an entrepreneur.
